channel.title: Surface Tension Uncut memory leak crashes game
channel.description:
Hi,
Tried to find an aswer to this, no luck. Game reports memory leak and crashes at this point of Surface Tension ( [url]https://lambdageneration.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/lambdageneration-stu-3-2.jpg[/url] ) at the top of the stairs once the tank has rolled out from the right and stopped. Tried lowering graphics to a mimimum and lowering resolution but nothing helps. Until this point the game runs very smoothly.
Help?

item.title: Surface Tension Uncut memory leak crashes game
item.dc:creator: ESToomere
item.description:
How much RAM do you have and running HDD or SSD?

Read full topic
item.source: Surface Tension Uncut memory leak crashes game
